name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Build Engineer with 8 years of experience, I am adept in project management and risk management, ensuring SHEQ compliance and effective budget management while coordinating with local authorities. My expertise includes site audits and network activation, enabling me to implement robust quality and safety standards across all project phases. I excel in documentation management and proactive problem solving, fostering continuous improvement through team collaboration.
In my previous roles, I have leveraged my technical background in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, **Azure**, and **AWS** to develop high-performance solutions that align with compliance standards and integrate advanced capabilities like AI/ML for predictive analytics. With a solid foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I am committed to delivering secure and efficient applications.
